thread.title: China Wants Tech Darlings Like Alibaba and Tencent to List at Home - WSJ

author: Chao Deng
title: China Wants Tech Darlings Like Alibaba and Tencent to List at Home - WSJ

organizations.name: china wants tech darlings like alibaba

text:
BEIJING—The Chinese government is considering plans that would allow shares in technology giants such as Tencent Holdings Ltd. and Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. to trade back home, a move that could raise the profile of the country’s tightly controlled capital markets.
The country’s securities regulator has reached out to a number of state-owned investment banks to explore ways to let already-listed companies and private businesses issue shares on the mainland, according to investment bankers briefed on the discussions.
